channel.title: Andrei Popa - Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Andrei Popa - Personal Website

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Andrei Popa and I’m a software engineer. The word engineer is cool, it means a person who designs, builds and maintains something. And that’s my favorite perspective on software development: we design and build things with code. I enjoy chasing down and fixing bugs (it’s like a puzzle that requires a very good understanding of the entire system in order to solve efficiently) and I’m a fan of keeping things organized.
